name: An Apple a Day...
description:
Dear Dr. Xavier, 

The League of Doctors is in danger, as hordes of fruit ascend towards our mighty fortress. Certainly our walls will crumble without your help. Quickly! Come to our aid before we are erased from history!

-Dr. Z

Information/Controls:

-Arrow Keys or WASD to move

-Press E to open doors and interact with signs

-The rest is explained in the tutorial level!
